aboutDescription: With one year of experience in web and mobile development, I am expanding my skills towards a 360° vision. I am joining the Application Designer-Developer (CDA) program to master Full-Stack architecture and the fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence. I am looking for a work-study program to contribute to large-scale projects, from the user interface to the deployment of models.
softwareDeveloperDescription: Detailed description of your experience as a software developer...
agentTriDescription: Detailed description of your experience as an interim sorting agent...
hospitalDescription: Detailed description of your experience as a radiology manipulator...
project1Description: Text Maestro is a web application that uses artificial intelligence to improve and rewrite texts in Portuguese. With an intuitive interface, the tool allows for quick text enhancement for correction, formalization, simplification, persuasion, or social media optimization.
project2Description: This is a password generator developed with PHP.
project3Description: Freelance project for a landing page to sell products for a breakfast basket shop.
project4Description: HabitWave is a web application for building habits, managing tasks, and improving productivity. With an intuitive interface, it allows you to track your progress, view a dynamic calendar, and customize reminders.
project5Description: An institutional website project for a psychologist named Flavia Araujo. The project has a responsive design and dynamic information, being a redesign of the professional's old site.
project6Description: A full-stack web project of a real-time chat application, with a Node.js and Express server and a React.js frontend.
